ygData.subject: Re: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS... Quest Info (Sir Lindel?)
ygData.msgSnippet: You get about 5 silver, a pat on the back, and rolling laughter from your friends upon completeing most quests.  Want the Screaming mace?  Take up brewing and
ygData.messageBody:
You get about 5 silver, a pat on the back, and rolling laughter from your
friends upon completeing most quests. Want the Screaming mace? Take up
brewing and BUY IT.

Start over as a wizard on Zek and blast your way into riches.

Dont mind me, I'm very dissapointed. For the previous post regarding it
getting better at 22...it doesn't. I recomend you guys find great friends
who do not mind you leaching off their XP and level that way.

~Xillith.

>From: "David" <milamber@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS...
>Quest Info (Sir Lindel?)
>Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 10:48:10 -0500
>
>From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
>Not, to get into this much because I just rolled to 15 last night, but I
>was
>thought I was going to get a DoT spell and well NO (thought engulfing
>darkness was DoT for some reason). OK, Can't really travel effectively,
>can't rely on HT, Pet gets wacked it 7 or 8 hits (haven't tried new pet
>yet), No magic wepon. OK, I see cleics using their summon 1h blunt hitting
>wisp that are green to me, can I kill one(?), no... considering that my
>only
>damage spell is disease cloud (5pts whoppy!).
>
>I was in fire storm yesterday for about 4 hours and felt like a big anchor.
>My group was getting hit by elemental and all I could do their was just be
>a
>hp sponge by trying to taunt while the magic classes attacked it. Oh, and
>I
>was level 14, the highest in the group. But thinking about it now fighters
>would also be sitting on the side lines in this area. I know a 12 lvl
>magic
>user who used root in this area and pushed himself up to like level 15 or
>16
>in a week or two (I will admit he was on for a very long time), he is now
>like level 25. Just kind of disappointing, not that I am going to give it
>up, because people tell me that it gets better around level 22, but I agree
>with the post that we should get the invisibility spell at 22, plus a
>serious DoT spell just for making it to that level. Anyway maybe we should
>get a shadow knight only spell of some kind, make 1 or 2 for each spell
>levels and make it a quest of some kind. Maybe a Direct Damage spell like
>harm touch is, but it just uses mana (but not the same damage amount), or
>a
>radius damage spell (thought those were cool looking), or how about a
>radius
>life tap that give us hp back from all creatures around us ... just watch
>out for your party!
>
>Also just wanted to ask, has anyone completed the quest for Sir Lindel
>(something of the effect) I found him last night, attacked him, he ran
>away, I started to follow then he vanished, I had no lag, and nothing
>killed
>him because he was still my target. So, I waited for him to return. He
>came back full hit points, I attacked him again, he ran again, then I
>started to follow him and then vanished again, no lag, still targeted so
>nothing had killed him. Again he comes back, I get hit by an elemental
>from
>behind, moved so elemental wasn't hitting me from behind, elemental and him
>start attacking each other ... elemental kills him... grrr. I don't under
>stand why he vanished but now I have engulfing darkness, which I will use,
>but just wondered what you will get when completing the quest... magic
>weapon (I hope)? or just more faction bonus. Also does anyone know where
>he
>spawns at or is it just random?
>
>David
>
